faq.question: What is ashwagandha?
faq.answer: Also known as 'Indian Ginseng' this is an adaptogenic herb that is associated with supporting mental wellbeing and promoting relaxation and has been used in natural medicine for over 3,000 years. Ashwagandha for anxiety is particularly well-known, as it has been shown to help manage stress and anxiety symptoms in some people.

faq.question: What does ashwagandha do for your body?
faq.answer: If you're someone who's always on the go and feeling anxious, ashwagandha might be a helpful supplement to include. It's been known to help with stress, anxiety, low mood and can even help with memory, concentration, and relaxation.

faq.question: Can I take my ashwagandha gummies on an empty stomach?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Many people find that taking ashwagandha on an empty stomach can make it more effective. So feel free to take it whenever is most convenient for you.

faq.question: What makes Ashwagandha KSM-66® the best ashwagandha supplement?
faq.answer: There's no other root extract on the market that's as potent, easy to absorb and full-spectrum as our Ashwagandha KSM-66® blend. We've paired it with other high-grade vitamins, such as Iodine, which helps release energy, boosts cognitive function, and promotes normal nerve function. We've also added Vitamin B5 to support normal mental performance.

faq.question: Is ashwagandha suitable for women and men?
faq.answer: Yes, ashwagandha can be used by both women and men. It is an adaptogenic herb known to help with stress, anxiety and fatigue, which are common ailments everyone experiences.

faq.question: Can ashwagandha help increase testosterone levels in men?
faq.answer: Yes, ashwagandha has been found to increase testosterone levels in men. Ashwagandha can be an option for men looking to support healthy testosterone levels.

faq.question: Does ashwagandha help with sleep and relaxation?
faq.answer: Yes, ashwagandha has been used for centuries to promote relaxation and support better sleep quality.

faq.question: Can you use ashwagandha aid in weight loss efforts?
faq.answer: While ashwagandha is not a weight loss supplement, it has been shown to help reduce stress levels which can be a contributing factor to weight gain. Ashwagandha can help support a healthy stress response and overall well-being.

faq.question: Is there any evidence that ashwagandha can help with hair loss?
faq.answer: Yes, some studies have suggested that ashwagandha may help with hair loss by reducing cortisol levels, which can contribute to hair loss.

faq.question: Do you use organic ashwagandha?
faq.answer: Yes, we use organic ashwagandha in our Ashwagandha KSM-66® supplement to ensure the highest quality and purity.

faq.question: Are calcium tablets recommended for women?
faq.answer: Yes, calcium is an essential mineral that plays a critical role in maintaining strong and healthy bones. Women, in particular, are at higher risk of osteoporosis, making it crucial to ensure adequate calcium intake. Nutriburst's Women's Multivitamin contains Vitamin D and K that work together to boost calcium absorption and direct it to the bones, preventing calcium accumulation in blood vessels.

faq.question: What vitamins help balance hormones in females?
faq.answer: Nutriburst's Women's Multivitamin contains vitamin B6, which helps regulate hormonal activity by assisting with the synthesis and metabolism of neurotransmitters. Zinc is also a key ingredient that promotes fertility and reproduction by supporting healthy hormone levels. In addition, the supplement includes Choline, Coenzyme Q10 and Inositol, natural ingredients that provide additional benefits. These are the best vitamins to take daily for women.

faq.question: Can you take these gummy vitamins for menopause and fatigue?

While they're not designed specifically for menopause, they can definitely be a great addition to your daily routine. faq.question: What are the best supplements for men's health?
faq.answer: The best multivitamins for men are those that provide a balance of essential nutrients to support overall health and wellbeing. faq.question: What's the best time of day to take the Men's Multivitamin?
faq.answer: It's a good idea to have them with a meal that has some fat in it, so your body can absorb the fat-soluble nutrients easily. But you can take them with any meal that fits your schedule and preferences.

faq.question: Can men benefit from taking Choline and Inositol supplements?
faq.answer: Yes, men can benefit from taking Choline and Inositol supplements. Our Nutriburst Men's Multivitamin includes both Choline and Inositol, naturally found in the body, to provide additional support for your health. Choline plays a vital role in several bodily functions, including healthy nerve and liver function, brain development, and muscle movement. Inositol is important for cell signalling and may help improve insulin sensitivity, making it a great supplement for those looking to manage their blood sugar levels.

faq.question: Can inositol help with weight loss in men?
faq.answer: Studies have suggested that inositol may help support weight loss efforts in men by promoting insulin sensitivity and reducing appetite. It's important to note that supplements alone are not a replacement for a healthy diet and exercise routine.

faq.question: What are hair gummies and do they help with hair growth?
faq.answer: Hair gummies are a popular dietary supplement that contains a variety of vitamins and nutrients that are essential for healthy hair growth. If you want to support healthy hair growth, our Hair, Skin & Nails vitamin contains a mix of Biotin, Vitamin D and other essential nutrients to provide a comprehensive approach. Biotin supplements are especially popular because they are known to promote stronger, healthier hair. Vitamin D can also be beneficial for hair growth, as it helps create new hair follicles.

faq.question: Is biotin a good supplement for promoting hair growth?
faq.answer: Yes, biotin is a popular supplement for promoting hair growth. Biotin, which is a type of B vitamin, helps to create amino acids that produce a form of keratin, a protein that is essential for healthy hair. Regularly taking biotin supplements can help to improve hair thickness, strength, and growth, but results may vary from person to person.

faq.question: How does biotin help with hair growth and can it prevent hair loss?
faq.answer: Biotin helps to create the building blocks of keratin, a protein that is essential for healthy hair. By improving the keratin infrastructure of your hair, biotin can help to reduce hair loss, promote hair growth and increase hair thickness. Biotin supplements can help to provide the body with the necessary nutrients to create healthy hair, but it's important to keep in mind that hair loss can be caused by a variety of factors.

faq.question: What vitamins are good for hair loss and promoting hair growth and thickness?
faq.answer: If you are experiencing hair loss, it may be helpful to take vitamins that support healthy hair growth and thickness, such as Biotin and Vitamin D. Our Hair, Skin & Nails vitamin gummies are a great source of these vitamins. Biotin supplements can help to strengthen hair and increase its thickness, while Vitamin D can promote the growth of new hair follicles.

faq.question: Can Vitamin D deficiency cause hair loss?
faq.answer: Yes, Vitamin D deficiency can contribute to hair loss. Vitamin D is essential for the growth and health of hair follicles, and a deficiency in this vitamin can lead to hair thinning or hair loss. It's important to ensure that you are getting enough Vitamin D through your diet or supplements to support healthy hair growth. Consider trying our Vitamin D3+K2 gummies to supplement your daily Vitamin D intake.

faq.question: What is vitamin D deficiency?
faq.answer: Vitamin D deficiency occurs when your body doesn't get enough Vitamin D to maintain healthy functioning. This can lead to bone weakness, fatigue, and an increased risk of certain health conditions. It's important to get your Vitamin D levels checked regularly and to take a Vitamin D supplement if necessary.

faq.question: When is the best time of year to take Vitamin D?
faq.answer: If you're living in the northern hemisphere between autumn and late March, you might not be getting enough of it naturally. That's why the NHS recommends everyone to take a Vitamin D supplement during this time. But some people might need to take it all year round, especially if they have darker skin, live in cities with limited sunlight, are housebound or work indoors. Some of us may need a year-round supply, especially those with darker skin, living in cities with limited sunlight, the housebound and people who work indoors all day.

faq.question: Is this gummy a vegan and vegetarian Vitamin D source?
faq.answer: Yes, our Nutriburst Vitamin D3 & K2 gummies are a vegan-friendly and vegetarian source of Vitamin D. They provide Vitamin D in an active form from a plant-based source, making it an ideal chewable Vitamin D option for those following a vegan or vegetarian lifestyle.

faq.question: Why does this gummy contain Vitamin D3, K2 and M7?
faq.answer: We added Vitamin K2 (MK-7), a special form of Vitamin K2 sourced from natto, a fermented soybean product to help promote proper brain function and help prevent heart diseases. Our proprietary fermentation technique ensures that this vitamin has a higher bioavailability, making it easier for your body to absorb and utilise (8). Plus, it stays in your bloodstream for longer, giving your system more time to benefit from its effects. By combining it with a Vitamin D3 supplement, we've created a powerful duo that not only supports your immune system but also protects your bones and muscles.

faq.question: Is it possible to take too much Vitamin D?
faq.answer: Yes, it is possible to have too much of a good thing. While we all need enough Vitamin D, excessive intake can be harmful. It's nearly impossible to get too much Vitamin D from your diet or from sunlight, but you should always be responsible when taking supplements.

faq.question: Is turmeric good for you?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Turmeric has been used for centuries in traditional medicine for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. It contains a compound called curcumin, which has been studied for its potential health benefits.

faq.question: What are turmeric vitamins?
faq.answer: Turmeric vitamins are supplements that contain turmeric or curcumin as their main ingredient. They're designed to provide the potential health benefits of this plant in an easy-to-take form, such as our delicious gummies, rather than hard-to-swallow turmeric capsules or tumeric tablets.

faq.question: What is the best turmeric supplement?
faq.answer: The best turmeric supplement is one that contains a standardised amount of curcumin and is made from high-quality ingredients. Nutriburst's Turmeric 3000mg is a great option, as it contains 95% curcuminoids, the active ingredient in turmeric, and is made from vegan-friendly ingredients. Plus, it's easy to take - just 2 gummies per day.

faq.question: Do these gummies taste good?
faq.answer: People love these gummies and say they taste amazing, with a nice little kick of black pepper.

faq.question: Who can take turmeric gummies?
faq.answer: While turmeric supplements are generally safe, there are some people who should avoid them. If you're taking certain medications or have gallstones, or if you're pregnant or breastfeeding, it's best to check with your doctor first.

faq.question: When's the best time to take the turmeric gummy?
faq.answer: Some research suggests that taking them at night is best, but honestly, there's no wrong time to enjoy them.

faq.question: What is curcumin, and why is it important?
faq.answer: Curcumin is a naturally occurring compound found in turmeric. It's what gives turmeric its bright yellow colour and is responsible for many of its potential health benefits. Curcumin has anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties that may help to reduce inflammation and fight oxidative stress. It can be hard for the body to absorb curcumin, so we added black pepper extract to our supplement to help the body better digest and extract all its benefits.

faq.question: Can turmeric help with weight loss?
faq.answer: While more research is needed, some studies suggest that turmeric may have potential weight loss benefits. Turmeric may help to reduce inflammation, which can contribute to obesity and metabolic disorders. Nutriburst's Turmeric 3000mg contains a potent dose of curcuminoids, which may support healthy weight management as part of a balanced diet and exercise routine. It's important to speak with your healthcare provider before starting any new supplement regimen, especially if you have any pre-existing health conditions.

faq.question: Why do I need Vitamin D3?
faq.answer: Vitamin D3 is essential for bone health, immune function, and muscle strength. It helps the body absorb calcium, reducing the risk of bone-related conditions like osteoporosis. It also plays a role in mood regulation and overall vitality.

faq.question: Is 1000IU of Vitamin D3 enough?
faq.answer: Yes, 1000IU is a recommended daily dose for maintaining optimal Vitamin D levels, especially for those who may not get enough sunlight exposure. However, some individuals with a deficiency may require higher doses as advised by a healthcare professional.

faq.question: Why is D3 better than D2?
faq.answer: Vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol) is the natural form of Vitamin D that your body produces from sunlight, making it more effective in raising and maintaining blood Vitamin D levels compared to Vitamin D2 (ergocalciferol).

faq.question: Who should take Ultra D3 1000IU?
faq.answer: It is ideal for people who: * Spend little time in the sun (especially in winter) * Have darker skin tones, as melanin reduces Vitamin D synthesis * Follow a vegan or vegetarian diet with limited dietary sources of Vitamin D * Want to support their bone, muscle, and immune health daily

faq.question: Can Vitamin D3 help with mood and energy levels?
faq.answer: Yes! Low Vitamin D levels have been linked to fatigue and low mood. Supplementing with Vitamin D3 can help support a more balanced mood and steady energy levels.

faq.question: Is Ultra D3 1000IU vegan-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes, Nutriburst's Ultra D3 1000IU is derived from a plant-based source, making it suitable for vegans and vegetarians.

faq.question: What does Biotin do for hair, skin, and nails?
faq.answer: Biotin (Vitamin B7) plays a crucial role in the production of keratin, a protein that makes up hair, skin, and nails. Regular intake can help strengthen nails, reduce hair breakage, and promote a healthy skin barrier.

faq.question: Can Biotin help with hair thinning?
faq.answer: Yes, biotin supports hair follicle health, which can help with hair thickness and growth. While it is not a cure for genetic hair loss, it is beneficial for those experiencing weak, brittle, or thinning hair due to nutritional deficiencies.

faq.question: How long does it take to see results from Biotin PowerPlus?
faq.answer: Most users notice improvements in hair and nail strength within 6-8 weeks, though results can vary depending on individual health and lifestyle.

faq.question: Is Biotin PowerPlus suitable for men and women?
faq.answer: Yes, biotin is beneficial for both men and women looking to support healthy hair, skin, and nails.

faq.question: Can I take Biotin PowerPlus if I already consume biotin in my diet?
faq.answer: Yes, but it's good to be mindful of your total intake. Biotin is water-soluble, meaning excess amounts are excreted, but always follow the recommended dosage.

faq.question: Does Biotin help with metabolism?
faq.answer: Yes! Biotin supports the metabolism of carbohydrates, fats, and proteins, playing a role in converting food into energy.

faq.question: What is FemBalance and how does it support women's health?
faq.answer: FemBalance is a specialised formula designed to help regulate hormones, support menstrual health, and provide relief from PMS symptoms such as bloating, fatigue, and mood swings.

faq.question: Who should take FemBalance?
faq.answer: FemBalance is ideal for women who experience hormonal imbalances, irregular cycles, PMS symptoms, or menopause-related changes.

faq.question: What ingredients support hormone balance in FemBalance?
faq.answer: It includes key nutrients such as Vitamin B6 (which helps regulate hormonal activity), Zinc (for reproductive health), and natural extracts that support cycle regularity and mood stability.

faq.question: Can FemBalance help with mood swings?
faq.answer: Yes! Ingredients like Vitamin B6 and Magnesium support neurotransmitter function, helping to stabilise mood and reduce irritability.

faq.question: Will FemBalance help with bloating and cramps?
faq.answer: Yes, certain nutrients in FemBalance help to regulate water balance in the body and may ease bloating and cramps associated with PMS.

faq.question: Can I take FemBalance if I am on birth control?
faq.answer: FemBalance is a natural supplement, but it's always best to consult your doctor if you are taking hormonal birth control.

faq.question: Does FemBalance help with menopause symptoms?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides hormonal support that may help with common menopause symptoms like hot flashes, fatigue, and mood swings.

whySettle.description: Nutriburst stands out as the only brand that delivers certified, high-potency gummies designed to transform your energy, focus, and overall health - all in one delicious, plant-based bite.

settles.title: Other Gummies
settles: Sugar-loaded, chewy, stale
Single-benefit use: focus solely on bone strength, neglecting overall development and immune health
Vitamin D2: cheaper form of vitamin D, but less effective and not the natural form found in our bodies
Limited nutrient profile: offer lower or less effective doses, requiring more consistent use for results.
Chewy & Unpleasant: Tough, unpleasant textures that make it hard to stick to your routine

settles.title: Our Kids Mighty Bones
settles: Soft & delicious
Organic, Vegan, Sugar-Free: 100% plant-based and certified vegan. Uses only plant-derived ingredients and a pectin gummy base
Plant-based vitamin D3 (actually from mushrooms) which has a closer affinity to our body since it raises blood vitamin D levels for longer which increases its efficacy.
High-Potency Formula for Maximum Impact: Delivers 240mg of Calcium and 25µg of Vitamin D3 (500% NRV) per serving for effective daily support.
Comprehensive Growth & Bone Development: Supports strong bones, healthy teeth, and overall growth in developing children.

Trolls - Mighty Bones.howToTake: Give 2 gummies daily with food, preferebly in the morning for a strong start of the day. Pair it with their breakfast for a consistent routine.

nutritional.warning: Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.  Keep out of reach of children. Not suitable for children. Pregnant or breastfeeding women and those taking medication should consult with a doctor before use. Food supplements are not a substitute for a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.
